headline: After Days on Lockdown, Anger Boils Over and Doctors Plead for Aid
abstract: A man was detained after beating up a doctor in Wuhan, and medical staff members are wearing raincoats to protect against infection.
lead_paragraph: WUHAN, China â€” One week into a lockdown, anger and anxiety deepened in China on Thursday as the central province at the center of the coronavirus outbreak endured shortages of hospital beds, medical supplies and doctors.
